intro: Arthrosolen flavus, commonly known as the golden liverwort, is a type of non-vascular plant belonging to the family Pottiaceae. Arthrosolen flavus is often found growing on rocks or soil in temperate regions. Its simple morphology and ability to thrive in low-nutrient environments make it an important indicator species for certain ecological conditions.
